more_info.origin: Produced by a reaction of octane with maleic acid anhydride, followed by a reaction with sodium bisulphite.
more_info.products: Bakery products, but mainly used in pharmaceutical preparations
more_info.side_effects: The product acts as a laxative.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None, 480 can be used by all religious groups, vegans and vegetarians.
